text: @NYGovCuomo Wow so many people pretend they know more than worldwide infectious disease researchers & medical professionals. We’re being asked to wear masks bc it’s proven helps curb the spread of #COVID19 why is that so difficult? It’s simple #WearAMask love thy neighbor #WearAMaskNY
